title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM and Embeddings classes.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with local Ollama models; supports multi-model convos, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli (salty-flower/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, markdown rendering, and prompt management.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiller01/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub-Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline completions.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, POJO mapping, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rag (ggoonnzzaallo/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal Python repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and LangChain.

title: ollama-chat (pdevine/ollama-chat)
summary: Experimental chat app demonstrating Ollama streaming API via WebSockets and React frontend.

title: ollama-gui (dmi3y/ollama-gui)
summary: Lightweight Flask/Vue desktop app that wraps Ollama with a simple chat interface.

title: ollama-docker (ollama/ollama-docker)
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for running Ollama server and pre-pulling models.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration by deepset-ai to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-codellama-vscode (folke/ollama-codellama-vscode)
summary: VS-Code extension that pipes selected code to CodeLlama running in Ollama for explanation or generation.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Community Rust crate exposing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit (streamlit/ollama-streamlit)
summary: Streamlit demo app that lets users pick any local Ollama model and chat with parameter knobs.

title: ollama-go (mxyng/ollama-go)
summary: Unofficial Go client library for Ollama with idiomatic error handling and context cancellation.
